::Firearm/DeathScythe::

Firearm turns his head as he hears Hot Rod yells for backup. "You got it, 
kid," he says, transforming into his vehicle mode.

His arm cannon spins around into a horizontal position as the rest of his 
body folds in, treads emerging to make a tank.

"YEEHAA!!" he yells, driving at where his heat sensors detect DeathScythe, 
and firing his cannon.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DeathScythe easily dodges the rockets, some shrapnel digging into his neck. 
He growls. The shrapnel stuck in his back would make his position a bit 
easier to see.

He aims his gun again, the weapon flying out of his hand as a shot hits near 
him. He is thrown to the left, rolling several times on the ground. He jumps 
to his feet, right in time for a huge tank to crash into him, sending him 
flying a dozen feet before falling to the ground, unconscious.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm transforms back into robot mode, immediately aiming his gun arm at 
DeathScythe.

"Just have to hit 'em hard enough," he says to Hot Rod.
